action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two attacks, using Tree Club or Trash Lob in any combination.

action.name: Tree Club
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Trash Lob
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 8}, range 60/240 ft. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.
